title: S2 Ep33: Investing in Brexit
itunes:title: Investing in Brexit
description: As Brexit nears (again), are British firms choosing to invest in the UK or in other European markets? Are European firms investing in the UK to preserve access to its markets? And has "global Britain" got off the drawing board yet? Holger Breinlich and Dennis Novy lead Tim Phillips through the numbers.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
